html: I’m proud to have worked to bring Army Futures Command to Texas. As part of the largest Army reorganization in 45 years, the AFC will help the organization adopt new tech and explore 21st century solutions more efficiently.https://twitter.com/USArmy/status/1017777949255372801 …
text: I’m proud to have worked to bring Army Futures Command to Texas. As part of the largest Army reorganization in 45 years, the AFC will help the organization adopt new tech and explore 21st century solutions more efficiently.https://twitter.com/USArmy/status/1017777949255372801 …

html: Army Futures Command is charged with modernizing the Army for the future and integrating emerging technologies to meet future threats. From our universities to our technology sector, Texas is ready to partner with the @USArmy and propel the force into the future.
text: Army Futures Command is charged with modernizing the Army for the future and integrating emerging technologies to meet future threats. From our universities to our technology sector, Texas is ready to partner with the @USArmy and propel the force into the future.

html: Army Futures Command will implement cross-functional teams (CFT) that correspond with the Army’s top six modernization priorities: Long-Range Precision Fires, Next-Generation Combat Vehicle, Future Vertical Lift, the Network, Air-and-Missile Defense, and Soldier Lethality.
text: Army Futures Command will implement cross-functional teams (CFT) that correspond with the Army’s top six modernization priorities: Long-Range Precision Fires, Next-Generation Combat Vehicle, Future Vertical Lift, the Network, Air-and-Missile Defense, and Soldier Lethality.

html: Army Futures Command will bring 500 jobs to Austin between civilian and active-duty roles, as well as many more economic opportunities for Texas businesses who will support and supply the Command.
text: Army Futures Command will bring 500 jobs to Austin between civilian and active-duty roles, as well as many more economic opportunities for Texas businesses who will support and supply the Command.

html: For far too long, bureaucratic red tape has left projects like Lower Bois d’Arc Creek Reservoir unfinished. By eliminating those delays, this bill will help address the looming water crisis facing North Texas and provide certainty to Texas’ water supply.-->http://bit.ly/2LghEvG
text: For far too long, bureaucratic red tape has left projects like Lower Bois d’Arc Creek Reservoir unfinished. By eliminating those delays, this bill will help address the looming water crisis facing North Texas and provide certainty to Texas’ water supply.-->http://bit.ly/2LghEvG

html: Proud to introduce the North Texas Water Supply Security Act w my North #TX colleagues. This will ensure resolution of any litigation brought to challenge the Lower Bois d’Arc Creek Reservoir Project in order to make certain that the project can be completed in a timely manner.

html: I know that veterans in Houston, across Texas, and beyond will be well served by this new development. I look forward to the continued success of Camp Hope and congratulate them on the groundbreaking of the new townhomes to serve veterans living with #PTSD.
text: I know that veterans in Houston, across Texas, and beyond will be well served by this new development. I look forward to the continued success of Camp Hope and congratulate them on the groundbreaking of the new townhomes to serve veterans living with #PTSD.

html: I am glad to see Camp Hope moving forward with their mission with the groundbreaking of four new townhouses, which will be used to provide shelter for veterans and their families seeking treatment at their facilities.
text: I am glad to see Camp Hope moving forward with their mission with the groundbreaking of four new townhouses, which will be used to provide shelter for veterans and their families seeking treatment at their facilities.

html: June is #PTSDAwarenessMonth, a time for us to shine a light on a challenge that afflicts veterans. With veteran suicide rates continuing at alarming levels & a tragic stigma surrounding mental health issues, I'm grateful for organizations like Camp Hope, who help vets year-round.
text: June is #PTSDAwarenessMonth, a time for us to shine a light on a challenge that afflicts veterans. With veteran suicide rates continuing at alarming levels & a tragic stigma surrounding mental health issues, I'm grateful for organizations like Camp Hope, who help vets year-round.

html: During my visit, I met with veterans who dedicated their lives to protect and serve our great nation, only to return home with mental scars making the transition to civilian life more difficult.

html: Twenty-nine years ago, today, students and professors in China peacefully gathered in Beijing’s Tiananmen Square, calling on the Communist regime to end its oppressive rule over the Chinese people. In response, the regime sent tanks and soldiers to mow them down.
